input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Generalist - 3rd shift - Monett Hatchery #1

Location: Monett, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Details:

Job Description

Description:

This position is responsible for repairing and operating machinery while maintaining a safe work environment and adhering to Tyson policies and procedures. This position requires proficiency in multiple areas such as electrical, mechanical systems, pneumatic systems, and manufacturing processes. This position is responsible for maintaining plant equipment to supply maximum quality while ensuring the safest work possible.

This position is responsible for troubleshooting, maintaining, and repairing all equipment and company assets while maintaining a safe work environment and adhering to Tyson policies and procedures.

Department:

Maintain and repair equipment. Mechanical, hydraulic, pneumatics, and welding. Other duties as assigned. Standing, walking, bending, stretching, climbing, pushing, pulling, reaching, and required to include work on ladders. This position works in a cold, damp to hot and humid environment, and slippery surfaces. Good communication with management and all departments. Must maintain an updated pallet Jack and forklift license.

Position Specific:

Must have 12 months continuous work history with a single employer. Applicants will be considered for Maintenance type opening on 3rd Shift. Maintain and repair all plant equipment. Must have basic knowledge of electrical, mechanical, hydraulic, pneumatics, and welding. Perform preventative maintenance on equipment. Must be able to demonstrate hands on abilities, skills will be enhanced through computer-based training modules. Furnish own hand tools. Other duties as assigned. Must be able to handle extreme temperature changes and fast paced work environment

Minimum rehire waiting period is 180 days.

Not eligible for rehire if previously employed by Tyson Foods 3 or more times.

This position is responsible for troubleshooting, maintaining, and repairing all equipment and company assets while maintaining a safe work environment and adhering to Tyson policies and procedures.

Relocation Assistance Eligible:

No

Work Shift: 

3RD SHIFT (United States of America)

Hourly Applicants ONLY -You must complete the task after submitting your application to provide additional information to be considered for employment.

Tyson is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, national origin, color, religion, age, genetics, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.

We provide our team members and their families with paid time off; 401(k) plans; affordable health, life, dental, vision and prescription drug benefits; and more.

CCPA Notice. If you are a California resident, and would like to learn more about what categories of personal information we collect when you apply for this job, and how we may use that information, please read our CCPA Job Applicant Notice at Collection, click here.

Experience Level (if available): None

Proficiency in electrical, mechanical systems, pneumatic systems, and manufacturing processes
Maintaining plant equipment to supply maximum quality
Troubleshooting, maintaining, and repairing all equipment and company assets
Adhering to Tyson policies and procedures
